channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- Intel(R) Arc(TM) & Iris(R) Xe Graphics - WHQL - Windows drivers
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- Intel(R) Arc(TM) & Iris(R) Xe Graphics - WHQL - Windows drivers

item.title: CVE-2023-28404|2023-11-14T19:04:24.382Z -- n%2Fa -- intel%28r%29%20arc%28tm%29%20%26%20iris%28r%29%20xe%20graphics%20-%20whql%20-%20windows%20drivers
item.description: Out-of-bounds read in the Intel(R) Arc(TM) & Iris(R) Xe Graphics - WHQL - Windows drivers before version 31.0.101.4255 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-28401|2023-11-14T19:04:23.883Z -- n%2Fa -- intel%28r%29%20arc%28tm%29%20%26%20iris%28r%29%20xe%20graphics%20-%20whql%20-%20windows%20drivers
item.description: Out-of-bounds write in some Intel(R) Arc(TM) & Iris(R) Xe Graphics - WHQL - Windows drivers before version 31.0.101.4255 may allow authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.
